body:
My Channel

www.youtube.com/spritmage123

I got Fraps on my computer and I shall record... After recording another server I flopped the many things

I sounded to quiet...
My sister was screaming in the background
My brother kept coming in and out saying "HII YOUTUBE!!!"
And yeah....

I will improve
 

maybe...

title: My YouTube channel... Finally came (sorta)

replies.body: Don't get yourself down everyone starts somewhere, but where is the video? Give it another chance before you quit. Good luck. :)
replies.body_tagged: Don't get yourself down everyone starts somewhere, but where is the video? Give it another chance before you quit. Good luck. :)

replies.body:
I wish you the best of luck in future!
Don't give up either, no matter how hopeless it seems or if you only have a few subscribers at first.
EVERYONE has a spark eventually and I'm sure ill see you in a few months time with 1-3 thousand subs under your belt :D
